datamaps 0.0.2.9000

Add legend

Add a legend to the map.

add_legend(p)

Arguments

p

a datamaps object

Examples

data <- data.frame(name = c("USA", "FRA", "CHN", "RUS", "COG", "DZA"),
    values = c("N. America", "EU", "Asia", "EU", "Africa", "Africa"))

data %>%
    datamaps() %>%
    add_choropleth(name, values, colors = c("skyblue", "yellow", "orangered")) %>%
    add_legend()
#> Error in yaml.load(readLines(con), error.label = error.label, ...): argument "error.label" is missing, with no default
